text: xallxhˌ phuthrng srang chan fa thang ced læa thrng srang phændin k yeiyng nan phra baycha ca lng ma thamklang man thanghlay (chan fa læa phændin) pheux phwk cea ca di ru wa thæ cring xallxhˌ nan pen phuthrng xanuphaph henux thuk sing xyang læa thæ cring xallxhˌ nan thrng hxmlxm thuk sing xyang wi dwy khwam rxbru (khxng phraxngkh)
